meanings.sent1: My loyal yokemate always supports me.
meanings.sent2: She is my best friend and yokemate.
meanings.sent3: My furry yokemate, my pet dog, follows me everywhere.
meanings.sent4: In our journey of life, she is my trusted yokemate.
meanings.sent5: Having a reliable yokemate makes every day brighter.

meanings.definition: A person who works alongside another
meanings.sent1: At the farm, my yokemate helps me plow the fields.
meanings.sent2: We are yokemates in the kitchen, cooking together every evening.
meanings.sent3: My fellow yokemate and I always finish our tasks on time.
meanings.sent4: Side by side, we tackle challenges as yokemates.
meanings.sent5: Working with a dedicated yokemate makes the job easier.

meanings.sent1: Let us yokemate our efforts for a successful project.
meanings.sent2: The two companies decided to yokemate their resources.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces yokemated perfectly, completing the picture.
meanings.sent4: Their hearts yokemated as one, bound by love.
meanings.sent5: The colors yokemated beautifully, creating a stunning masterpiece.
